items.text: short of a length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven to long-off's right off the outside half of the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, steps out and flicks to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, can't get the on-drive past the bowler
items.postText: SunnyK: "All the other Afghan matches in the series, their strong point was succeeding in rotating strike which is the key to play in these fields. But this match so far, they haven't shown that empathy for strike rotation. That also proved greatly and unpredictably in case of Hong Kong too. I hope they would start rotating strike and not bother about boundaries."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, mistimed cut to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: uppish cut to the backward point boundary. Some extra bounce in the corridor as he backs away, but he manages to get this wide of the fielder
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off stump, stabbed off the front foot towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, chopped on the up to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length on off stump, pushed to mid-off's right with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, jabbed to third man's right with an open face
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, backs away and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: full drifting ball in at middle stump. Leans in and clips it off his toes into the leg side. There's a big appeal from keeper and bowler who think it might be pad first, but the umpire's right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, big stride and push to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, steps out and drives with the turn to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: arm ball at a length outside off. Goes back to that and somehow manages an under-edge on the cut
items.postText: Farhat Islam: "Usually watching your countrymen bat is more fun but today I am loving watching Bangladesh build up dots. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: uff get out of the way. No one's going to even try stopping that, so hard has Shahzad slapped at it. Short and wide ball and he sends it to the point boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs
